org.tigris.noodle.servlets
Class Noodle

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.servlet.GenericServlet
        |
        +--javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
              |
              +--org.tigris.noodle.servlets.Noodle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class Noodle
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

This is the main Noodle Servlet class. To implement within your own Servlet code, you simply need to copy/paste the stuff in the doGet() and init() methods, or just use this servlet directly.

Author:
Jon S. Stevens
See Also:

postToByteArray

public static final byte[] postToByteArray(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
This method will convert all the parameters of a HTTP request into a byte array. It isn't the most efficient and should only be used in systems where you cannot get access to the req.getInputStream().
